headline: Beach extension provides excellent contrast to safari intensity
summary: Adding 3-4 beach days after safari provides welcome relaxation and physical recovery. Zanzibar, Kenya coast, or Mozambique offer easy connections from safari destinations. The contrast between bush intensity and beach relaxation enhances both experiences. For honeymoons or longer trips, the combination is highly recommended.

assumptions.text: Safari involves early mornings and physical activity; beach provides recovery.
Zanzibar, Kenya coast, and Mozambique have easy connections from safari areas.
The contrast between activities enhances appreciation of both.

gains: Physical and mental recovery after intensive safari
Relaxed end to the trip before long flight home
losses: Time that could be more safari
Beach may feel anticlimactic after wildlife

change_conditions: If trip is under 7 days total, skip beach to maximize safari time.
If purely wildlife-focused, consider second safari location instead.
If honeymoon or anniversary, beach extension is strongly recommended.
If ending with long flight, beach recovery before travel helps.
